Features & Pricing
Staff Log In
Get A Demo
Get a demo
  • Features & Pricing
  • Staff Log In

The best pricing,

The app you just need !

Whether you're a small beauty boutique or a large, bustling beauty establishment, we have a plan that suits you perfectly.

Explore Pricing

All the features you need to effortlessly run your salon

Appointments

Online booking

Allows clients to schedule appointments. It provides real-time availability, empowers clients to choose specific services and staff.

Appointment scheduling

Efficiently manage operations, improve customer service, and optimize staff allocations.

Waitlist management

Efficiently handle client waitlists, filling any cancellations or last-minute openings promptly.

Booking widget

User-friendly, embedded tool that allows clients to book appointments directly from your salon’s website or social media pages.

Email/Text – Confirmations

This feature sends automated email and text messages to clients, upon the appointment confirmation.

Built-In payment processing

Streamlines the payment process, allowing clients to pay for their services and products directly through the system.

Calendar

Provides a visual representation of appointments & staff availability to efficiently manage client visits & staff schedules.

Packages

Allows salons to create bundled service offerings, providing clients with affordable and all-inclusive choices.

Appointment deposits

Allows salons to secure bookings by requiring clients to make a prepayment, reducing no-shows and cancellations.

Operations

point of sale (POS)

Easy and secure payment processing for your salon services and products, improving the checkout experience for clients.

Digital forms

Allows you to create, customize, and store client intake forms, consent forms, and questionnaires digitally.

Mobile app for staff

Enabling them to view their schedules, manage appointments, and access client information on-the-go.

Walk-in Manager

Enable you to manage on-the-spot unplanned appointments to be organized by assigning available staff or resources.

Gift cards

Feature helps in streamline the sales process and encourages repeat visits, contributing to client loyalty.

Social Booking Integration

Clients can schedule appointments directly through social media platforms, streamlining the booking process.

Branded web / mobile app

Enable salons to have a customized web and mobile app with their own branding, logo, and design, providing consistency.

Membership

Streamlines membership administration, automates renewals, and tracks usage for better insights & targeted marketing.

Website builder

Enables you to create & customize websites by providing templates, design tools, and integration with appointment booking.

Client Management

Comprehensive Client Profiles

Enable you to store detailed client information, including contact details, and service preferences.

Contact Management

Comprehensive client database to easily communicate with clients for appointment reminders, promotions, and updates.

Email/Text – reminders

This feature sends automated email and text messages to clients, upon the appointment reminders.

Client history management

Empowers businesses to personalize client experiences by referencing previous visits and recommending tailored services.

Loyalty Rewards

Incentivizes your client loyalty by offering points or discounts for repeat visits and referrals.

reputation management

Enables salon owners to monitor and respond to customer reviews and ratings, ensuring a positive online presence.

Staff Management

Payroll reports

Streamlines salary calculations, provides detailed reports, track commissions, and generates accurate paychecks.

Time clock

Feature enables you to monitor attendance, breaks, and overtime, simplifying the task of compensating your employees.

employee reminders

Sends automatic reminders to the staff about their upcoming appointments, ensuring they stay organized and prepared.

staff schedule management

Enables staff scheduling with a user-friendly interface, ensuring even distribution of appointments among team members.

Substitution management

Features simplifies staff replacements when unavailable, guaranteeing a seamless client experience with minimal interruptions.

Staff incentive management

Enable performance-based incentives, automate bonuses, and boost staff motivation for increased salon productivity.

Inventory Management

Product Categorization

Feature ensures efficient inventory control, simplifies restocking, and empowers salons to optimize their product offerings.

Track stock levels

Effortlessly track stock levels, receive notifications for low inventory, and make informed purchasing decisions.

Image library

Offers a visual catalog of clients and salon products, allowing staff to identify clients and products quickly.

Real-time inventory updates

Manage your stock levels, by allowing you to monitor product availability, track usage, and receive low-stock alerts in real time.

Expiration Date Tracking

Allows you to set expiration dates for products, automatically alerts you when items are nearing expiry.

Reports & Analytics

Appointments reports

Provides a comprehensive overview of your salon’s booking activity.

Expenses tracking

Provides a comprehensive overview of all expenses, categorizes them for easy analysis, and helps in budget allocation.

Staff productivity tracking

Provides a detailed overview of employee’s performance, appointments booked, completed, and revenue generated.

Location based reporting

Allows salon owners to analyze performance data and trends specific to each salon branch or location.

Product Consumption Reports

Provides salon owners with valuable insights about the usage of various salon products.

No shows reports

Provides insights into missed appointments, helping salon owners track and analyze instances of clients failing to show up.

Marketing

Rebooking prompt

Sends gentle reminders and offers convenient booking options, encourages clients to schedule their next appointment.

Text / Email marketing

Enhances customer engagement through text and email for promotions, appointment reminders, and special offers.

Customer referral programs

Incentivizes clients to refer friends and family by offering rewards or discounts for successful referrals.

Two-way texting

Provides a convenient channel for clients to ask questions or request info, enhancing communication and customer service.

Customizable email template

Allows salon owners to create personalized and professional email communications effortlessly.

Client review administration

Allows salon owners and staff to efficiently collect and manage customer reviews and feedback.

Support

Phone call support

Provides immediate assistance, helping them resolve issues, answer questions, and navigate software functions effectively.

Live chat support

Provides real-time assistance, enabling them to resolve queries, address concerns, and access immediate technical support.

Education & training

Provides comprehensive resources, including video tutorials and articles, to help salon owners in understanding the software.

Implementation support

Hands-on assistance to salon owners, guiding them through the setup and configuration of our software.

Priority support

Enjoy exclusive access to top-tier customer support with our software, ensuring your business operates smoothly and efficiently.

We offer the best in industry pricing, no hidden cost

Software with all the tools you need to grow your Salon business

Save time and money by opting for a powerful, user-friendly booking tool that streamlines salon management for you and your team.
Get A Demo

For enterprises committed to expanding and thriving

Our objective is to ensure your success. To tailor the solution precisely to your needs, here's what you can do. Reach out to us...

We're committed to your privacy. we use the information you provide to us to contact you about our relevant content, products, and services. You may unsubscribe at any time. View Privacy Policy.

FAQ’s

Can I transfer data from my old system?

Yes, we will transfer clients, products, and gift cards from your current system for free. Advanced transfer options are available.

What is the process to switch?

A dedicated onboarding specialist will work with you step-by-step to make the switch from the old system as easy as possible.

What features are included?
All of our features are list here
Is there a free trial available?

Yes, we offer a free trial so you can experience our software before making a commitment. Sign up to get started.

Do you charge based on the number of staff or clients?

Our pricing is typically based on the features you needed. Contact our sales team for customized plans if you have a large number of staff / clients.

Is there a setup fee or hidden costs?

No, we do not charge any setup fees or hidden costs. Our pricing is transparent and all-inclusive.

What support and training options are included with the pricing?

Our pricing includes access to our customer support team, as well as training materials to help you get the most out of our software.
